description:
11.152 lumakey
Turn certain luma values into transparency.

The filter accepts the following options:

softness.description: Set the range of softness. Use this to control gradual transition from zero to full transparency.

threshold.description: Set the luma which will be used as base for transparency.

tolerance.description: Set the range of luma values to be keyed out.

name: lumakey

parameters.description: Set the luma which will be used as base for transparency. Default value is 0.
parameters.name: threshold

parameters.description: Set the range of luma values to be keyed out. Default value is 0.01.
parameters.name: tolerance

parameters.description: Set the range of softness. Default value is 0. Use this to control gradual transition from zero to full transparency.
parameters.name: softness

source:
11.152 lumakey

Turn certain luma values into transparency.

The filter accepts the following options:

threshold

Set the luma which will be used as base for transparency. Default value is 0.

tolerance

Set the range of luma values to be keyed out. Default value is 0.01.

softness

Set the range of softness. Default value is 0. Use this to control gradual transition from zero to full transparency.
